snippet.title: Raptor: Call of the Shadows
snippet.description: Raptor is a vertically scrolling shooter developed by Cygnus Studios (today known as Mountain King Studios) and published by Apogee Software in 1994. In the future as a mercenary, you're sent on interplanetary missions to knock off top competitors of MegaCorp. This game has been re-released as a native Windows port in 1999.
